column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ On the night of April 11
column5: a Chinese worker was  seriously injured and immediately sent to the hospital in the village of Kampung
column6: Sihanoukville. The man had somehow fallen on a large metal spike
column7: which pierced through his armpit and out of his shoulder.------The unidentified victim was rescued by a team of doctors.------According to the director of Preah Sihanouk Referral Hospital
column8: the victim was rescued at night after the accident on a construction site.------This story was first seen on Huy Bunleng’s Facebook page
column10: so it’s likely the man in question is still alive.
